about.label: Why Choose Us
about.title: Your Car In Good Hands
about.paragraph1: Revicar is your trusted auto repair shop in Carcavelos. We work with all major car brands, offering a complete and professional service to keep your car in the best possible condition.
about.paragraph2: Our services include multi-brand general mechanics, bodywork and paint, auto electrical, air conditioning, and tyres. We also carry out warranty services and electronic diagnostic testing to identify any problem with precision.
about.paragraph3: At Revicar, transparency and trust are our core values. We always explain the issue, present a clear quote, and only proceed with your approval. Your car deserves the best care.

items.question: Do I need to make an appointment?
items.answer: For most services, an appointment is recommended so we can reserve time for your vehicle. However, we do accept walk-ins for quick services like battery testing or tyre pressure checks. Call us or send a WhatsApp message to schedule.

items.question: Do you work with all car brands?
items.answer: Yes, we are a multi-brand workshop. We service all major European and Asian manufacturers including BMW, Mercedes, Volkswagen, Audi, Renault, Peugeot, Toyota, Honda, and many more.

items.question: Will my manufacturer warranty remain valid?
items.answer: Absolutely. We perform all warranty services according to the manufacturer's specifications, using approved parts and procedures. Your warranty stays fully intact.

items.question: How long does a typical service take?
items.answer: A standard service or revision usually takes 2-4 hours. More complex repairs like engine work or bodywork & paint may take 1-3 days. We always give you a time estimate upfront before starting any work.

items.question: Do you provide a quote before starting?
items.answer: Always. Transparency is our core value. We diagnose the issue, explain what needs to be done, and present a clear written quote. We only proceed with your explicit approval — no surprises.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept cash, debit cards, credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), and MB Way. For larger repairs, we can also discuss payment arrangements.
